item.title: 加密货币领导人前往国会山推动市场结构法案
item.description: 包括 Coinbase Global Inc.首席执行官布莱恩-阿姆斯特朗（Brian Armstrong）和 Chainlink Labs 的谢尔盖-纳扎罗夫（Sergey Nazarov）周三与民主党和共和党领导人进行了近三个小时的会晤，讨论市场结构立法问题。【原文：About a dozen crypto industry leaders including Coinbase Global Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brian Armstrong and Chainlink Labs’ Sergey Nazarov met with Democratic and Republican leaders Wednesday for almost three hours to discuss market-structure legislation.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 股票狂飙引发做空狂潮
item.description: Beyond Meat Inc. 股价的快速反弹让一些卖空者争先恐后地退出头寸，以避免进一步的损失，而另一些卖空者则加倍押注该股。【原文：The rapid rally in shares of Beyond Meat Inc. has sent some short sellers scrambling to exit their positions to avoid further damage, while still others doubled down on their bets against the stock.】

item.title: 美国推出提高牛肉产量计划，增加阿根廷配额
item.description: 特朗普政府发布了一项鼓励放牧和提高国内牛肉产量的计划，同时还单独提高了阿根廷牛肉的进口配额。【原文：The Trump administration released a plan to encourage ranching and boost domestic beef production, as it separately raised a quota for Argentine beef imports.】

Gavekal Dragonomics’ Arthur Kroeber joins Trumponomics to discuss how the latest tit-for-tat reveals Beijing’s growing leverage in its standoff with Washington.

item.title: Waymo 将在纽瓦克机场测试配备人类驾驶员的车辆
item.description: Alphabet 公司旗下的 Waymo 将开始在纽瓦克机场与人类司机一起手动测试其自动驾驶汽车，为最终在该交通枢纽接送乘客奠定基础。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo will begin manually testing its autonomous vehicles with human drivers at Newark airport, laying the foundation to eventually ferry passengers to and from the transit hub.】

item.title: 铂金成为价格飙升和挤压担忧的最新贵金属
item.description: 最近白银市场的挤压还未尘埃落定，本周黄金又经历了剧烈的价格调整，贵金属交易商们又要面对另一出戏，这次是铂金市场。【原文：With the dust barely settled on the recent squeeze in the silver market, and with gold just this week experiencing a violent price correction, precious metals traders are contending with yet another drama, this time in the platinum market.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟开始与竞购者共享财务数据
item.description: 据一位熟悉华纳兄弟发现公司计划的人士透露，该公司预计最早将于本周开始要求有意竞购该影视巨头的竞购者签署保密协议。【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. expects to begin asking would-be bidders for the film and TV giant to sign nondisclosure agreements as early this week, according to a person familiar with its plans.】

item.title: 无人机 CEO 错过 Meme 股价暴涨 500% 的机会后毫不动摇
item.description: 当无人机盾牌有限公司（DroneShield Ltd.当首席执行官奥列格-沃尼克（Oleg Vornik）卖掉了他花了近十年时间创建的公司的全部股份时，他并不知道这家澳大利亚防务公司即将被卷入 "备忘录股票 "狂潮。【原文：When DroneShield Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Oleg Vornik sold his entire holding in the company he spent nearly a decade building, he had no idea that the Australian defense firm was about to be swept up in meme stock mania.】

item.description: 欧莱利汽车公司（O'Reilly Automotive Inc.【原文：O’Reilly Automotive Inc. raised its full-year earnings outlook, easing concerns about potential fallout from the bankruptcy of an auto parts supplier.】

item.title: 美国铝业公司认为铝运输的关税成本将继续上升
item.description: 美国铝业公司（Alcoa Corp.）称，美国第三季度对加拿大铝征收进口关税使其损失比前三个月多出6900万美元，显示出特朗普政府的贸易措施对该行业的持续影响。【原文：Alcoa Corp. said US import tariffs on Canadian aluminum in its third quarter cost it $69 million more than the previous three-month period, showing the continued impacts of the Trump administration’s trade measures on the industry.】

item.title: 美国在乌克兰和平进程中制裁俄罗斯石油公司和卢克石油公司
item.description: 美国宣布对俄罗斯最大的石油生产商实施制裁，这是特朗普政府迄今为止就乌克兰战争向总统弗拉基米尔-普京施压的最重要举措。【原文：The US announced sanctions on Russia’s biggest oil producers, the Trump administration’s most consequential bid so far to pressure President Vladimir Putin over the war in Ukraine.】

item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Southwest Airlines Co. posted a surprise adjusted profit in the third quarter, boosted by fees from its new policy of charging passengers for bags and expected record operating sales in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 炙手可热的散户交易者将势头追逐者变为囊中之物
item.description: 连续四天的大涨使无利可图的素食食品制造商 Beyond Meat Inc. 的股价上涨超过 1000%，但大部分涨幅瞬间化为乌有。金价创纪录地大涨，随后又出现了多年来最严重的两天暴跌。数十亿美元资金流入追踪比特币和索拉纳等波动较大的加密货币的高风险 ETF。【原文：A four-day rally that sent shares of the unprofitable vegetarian foodmaker Beyond Meat Inc. up more than 1,000%, only for a big chunk of the gains to vanish in a flash. A record-setting surge in gold prices, followed by the worst two-day selloff in years. Billions of dollars of inflows into risky ETFs that track volatile cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Solana.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，Polymarket 将在 DraftKings 的新举措中清理交易
item.description: Polymarket 首席执行官 Shayne Coplan 表示，该公司正在扩大其在快速增长的真实事件投注业务中的作用，为 DraftKings Inc.【原文：Polymarket Chief Executive Officer Shayne Coplan said the firm is expanding its role in the fast-growing business of betting on real-world events by clearing trades under DraftKings Inc.’s new push into the prediction markets.】

item.title: 在 "不确定 "的经济形势下，SAP 云计算收入不及预期
item.description: 欧洲最有价值的软件公司 SAP SE 公布的第三季度云计算收入不及分析师预期，这表明贸易争端和经济疲软正在拖累销售。【原文：SAP SE, Europe’s most valuable software company, reported third-quarter cloud revenue that missed analysts’ estimates in a sign that trade disputes and a weaker economy are weighing on sales.】

item.title: 红帽软件业务增长乏力，IBM业绩下滑
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines Corp.）报告称，其密切关注的红帽（Red Hat）部门的收入令人失望，引发了将软件业务视为公司增长关键之一的投资者的担忧。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. reported disappointing revenue in its closely watched Red Hat unit, sparking concerns among investors who see the software business as among the keys to the company’s growth.】

item.title: 英国央行行长伍兹抨击 "高风险 "银行推动放宽资本规则
item.description: 英格兰银行的最高金融监管机构批评了银行业推动更优惠地对待政府债券的做法，并在其最后一次豪宅演讲中谴责了那些呼吁放宽规则的人。【原文：The Bank of England’s top financial regulator criticized the banking industry’s push for a more favorable treatment of government bonds, using his final Mansion House address to denounce those calling for looser rules.】

item.title: 软银利用美元和欧元债券市场融资 29 亿美元
item.description: 软银集团公司通过发行美元和欧元次级混合债券出售了约 29 亿美元，该公司正在加强全球筹资，以推动对人工智能（包括 OpenAI）的投资。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. sold about $2.9 billion through an offering of subordinated hybrid bonds in dollars and euros as the company steps up global fundraising to fuel investments in artificial intelligence, including OpenAI.】

item.title: 金默里奇称英联邦液化天然气交易将于年底结束
item.description: Kimmeridge 能源管理公司正准备宣布其在路易斯安那州海岸开发的液化天然气出口终端的最终供应交易。【原文：Kimmeridge Energy Management Co. is preparing to announce the final supply deals for the liquefied natural gas export terminal it’s developing on the Louisiana coast.】

item.title: 阿根廷经济在中期选举前略有增长
item.description: 尽管流动性紧缩，阿根廷经济在 8 月份仍实现了月度小幅扩张，在本周末关键的中期选举之前为总统哈维尔-米莱赢得了胜利。【原文：Argentina’s economy posted a slight monthly expansion in August despite a liquidity crunch in a win for President Javier Milei ahead of a critical midterm election this weekend.】

item.title: 美联储失去 ADP 劳工统计数据加剧数据真空
item.description: 美联储不再从独立供应商处接收私营部门就业数据，这使得决策者在联邦政府持续停摆的情况下更加缺乏及时的经济信息。【原文：The Federal Reserve is no longer receiving data on private-sector employment from an independent provider, adding to policymakers’ lack of timely information on the economy amid the ongoing federal government shutdown.】

item.title: 改革派法拉奇推动英国加密货币促销全面改革
item.description: 英国改革派领导人奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）表示，在数字资产行业努力遵守其标准之后，应该放宽对加密货币公司如何向消费者推销自己的规定。【原文：Reform UK leader Nigel Farage said rules governing how crypto companies market themselves to consumers should be slackened, after the digital asset industry has struggled to comply with its standards.】

item.title: 特斯拉第三季度盈利分析
item.description: 一辆特斯拉汽车停在加利福尼亚州瓦莱霍的特斯拉商店里。摄影师：大卫-保罗-莫里斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A Tesla vehicle at the company's store in Vallejo, California. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 尽管价格暴跌，黄金发烧友仍坚守本心
item.description: 最近几周，随着黄金一路走高，进入未知领域，就连顽固的黄金爱好者也警告说，黄金的快速反弹已经失控。现在，随着金价暴跌，他们坚信金银的长期牛市尚未结束。【原文：As gold pushed higher and higher into uncharted territory in recent weeks, even die-hard enthusiasts warned that the rapid rally was getting out of hand. Now, with prices plunging, they’re keeping faith that bullion’s longer-term bull market isn’t over yet.】

item.title: 预测市场 Kalshi 以超过 100 亿美元的估值获得投资者青睐
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，预测市场 Kalshi 正在接受风险投资人的融资提议，对这家初创公司的估值将超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Prediction market Kalshi is receiving funding offers from venture capital investors that would value the startup at more than $10 billion, according to people familiar with the matter — interest that comes just weeks after Kalshi announced a $300 million funding round at a $5 billion valuation.】

item.title: 全球最大的退休社区利用小额贷款市场帮助建造更多房屋
item.description: 世界上最大的退休社区正通过近 1.3 亿美元的高收益债务交易进一步扩张。【原文：The largest retirement community in the world is expanding even further with a nearly $130 million high-yield debt deal.】

item.title: 西部联盟发现贷款中不再有违规行为
item.description: Western Alliance Bancorp 在其贷款组合中没有发现更多违规行为，也不希望出现更多与 First Brands 集团倒闭和一家商业房地产投资公司潜在欺诈有关的意外。【原文：Western Alliance Bancorp hasn’t found any more irregularities in its loan portfolio and doesn’t expect more surprises tied to the collapse of First Brands Group and a potential fraud at a commercial real estate investment firm.】

item.title: CPI 延迟公布在即，美元看涨信号浮现
item.description: 本季度伊始，美元走势较为坚挺，有迹象表明，在本周推迟公布的美国消费者价格数据公布之前，交易员们正准备迎接进一步的看涨势头。【原文：The dollar has kicked off the quarter on a firmer note, and there are signs traders are bracing for further bullish momentum before this week’s delayed release of US consumer-price data.】
